verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֬חַ ׀ <S%H5329><s%> To the chief Musician לִבְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> for the sons קֹ֬רַח <S%H7141><s%> of Korah מִזְמֽוֹר׃ <S%H4210><s%> A Psalm כָּֽל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָ֭עַמִּים <S%H5971><s%> all ye people תִּקְעוּ־ <S%H8628><s%> O clap כָ֑ף <S%H3709><s%> your hands הָרִ֥יעוּ <S%H7321><s%> shout לֵ֝אלֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> unto God בְּק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> with the voice רִנָּֽה׃ <S%H7440><s%> of triumph

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> For יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> For the LORD עֶלְי֣וֹן <S%H5945><s%> most high נוֹרָ֑א <S%H3372><s%> [is] terrible מֶ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> King גָּ֝דוֹל <S%H1419><s%> [he is] a great עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> over all the earth

יַדְבֵּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> He shall subdue עַמִּ֣ים <S%H5971><s%> the people תַּחְתֵּ֑ינוּ <S%H8478><s%> under וּ֝לְאֻמִּ֗ים <S%H3816><s%> under us and the nations תַּ֣חַת <S%H8478><s%> under רַגְלֵֽינוּ׃ <S%H7272><s%> under our feet

יִבְחַר־ <S%H977><s%> He shall choose לָ֥נוּ אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נַחֲלָתֵ֑נוּ <S%H5159><s%> our inheritance אֶ֥ת <S%H853><s%> גְּא֨וֹן <S%H1347><s%> for us the excellency יַעֲקֹ֖ב <S%H3290><s%> of Jacob אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> whom אָהֵ֣ב <S%H157><s%> whom he loved סֶֽלָה׃ <S%H5542><s%> Selah

עָלָ֣ה <S%H5927><s%> is gone up אֱ֭לֹהִים <S%H430><s%> God בִּתְרוּעָ֑ה <S%H8643><s%> with a shout יְ֝הֹוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD בְּק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> with the sound שׁוֹפָֽר׃ <S%H7782><s%> of a trumpet

זַמְּר֣וּ <S%H2167><s%> Sing praises אֱלֹהִ֣ים <S%H430><s%> to God זַמֵּ֑רוּ <S%H2167><s%> sing praises זַמְּר֖וּ <S%H2167><s%> sing praises לְמַלְכֵּ֣נוּ <S%H4428><s%> unto our King זַמֵּֽרוּ׃ <S%H2167><s%> sing praises

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for מֶ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> [is] the King כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all הָאָ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of all the earth אֱלֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> For God זַמְּר֥וּ <S%H2167><s%> sing ye praises מַשְׂכִּֽיל׃ <S%H7919><s%> with understanding

מָלַ֣ךְ <S%H4427><s%> reigneth אֱ֭לֹהִים <S%H430><s%> God עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over גּוֹיִ֑ם <S%H1471><s%> over the heathen אֱ֝לֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> God יָשַׁ֤ב ׀ <S%H3427><s%> sitteth עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over כִּסֵּ֬א <S%H3678><s%> upon the throne קָדְשֽׁוֹ׃ <S%H6944><s%> of his holiness

נְדִ֘יבֵ֤י <S%H5081><s%> The princes עַמִּ֨ים ׀ <S%H5971><s%> of the people נֶאֱסָ֗פוּ <S%H622><s%> are gathered together עַם֮ <S%H5971><s%> [even] the people אֱלֹהֵ֪י <S%H430><s%> of the God אַבְרָ֫הָ֥ם <S%H85><s%> of Abraham כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for לֵֽ֭אלֹהִים <S%H430><s%> [belong] unto God מָֽגִנֵּי־ <S%H4043><s%> for the shields אֶ֗רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the earth מְאֹ֣ד <S%H3966><s%> he is greatly נַעֲלָֽה׃ <S%H5927><s%> exalted
